name: HillbillyWars
description:
This is a free game, which was made for a University project.

The goal in the game is simple - earn points by killing enemies and collecting chests. Have the best possible score at the end of the game. Compete with your friends who can score higher. And just have fun.

Each level is a little bit harder than the last one. To pass the level you have to reach the teleporter gem.

I plan to implement bosses, shops, saves and new enemies, when I have the time.

The game ends, when you complete all levels.

Controls:

  • Use W A D to move
  • Use SPACE to attack
